name: Thwapstick
description:
Life is hard as a slime. Adventurers kill them, skeletons use them as pillows and they can't ever get a date because they're just well; slimey. This is a story not about your typical adventurer but of a humble slime named Slimeuel.  

Help Slimeuel navigate through the traps and dangers that haunt his every waking moment. BUT be careful not to venture too far into the darkness, there are scarier monsters than just your average skeleton out there...
